query.statement: INSERT INTO UWFDTB0501(TAG_ID, MSG_ID, TAG_NM, REG_DT) VALUES('T'||LPAD(CAST(NEXTVAL('UWFDTB0501_SEQ_01') AS TEXT), 14, '0'), :msgId, :tagNm, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
INSERT INTO CDCTCTAG(TAG_ID, MSG_ID, TAG_NM) VALUES('T'||LPAD(CAST(NEXTVAL('CDCTCTAG_SEQ_01') AS TEXT), 14, '0'), :msgId, :tagNm)
INSERT INTO CDCTCREGNINFO(REGN_INF_ID, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, COMPASS) VALUES(:regnInfId, :latitude, :longitude, :compass)
SELECT 'I'||LPAD(CAST(NEXTVAL('UWFDTB0401_SEQ_01') AS TEXT), 14, '0') AS IMG_ID
UPDATE UWFDTB0201 SET USER_IMG=:userImg WHERE USER_ID=:userId

SELECT MSG_ID, CASE WHEN USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||USER_ID || '['||WRITER_ID||']' WHEN USER_SR_CODE='001' AND USER_ID<>WRITER_ID THEN '@'||USER_ID || '['||WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||USER_ID END AS USER_INFO, USER_ID, REGN_INF_ID, MSG_CN, REG_DT, INFO_ID, WRITER_ID, VIEW_CNT, USER_IMG, IMG_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0311 E WHERE E.MSG_ID=R.MSG_ID) AS RPL_CNT FROM (SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0501_IX01) INDEX(B UWFDTB0301_IX02) INDEX(C UWFDTB0401_PK) USE_NL(C D)*/ B.MSG_ID, B.USER_ID, B.REGN_INF_ID, B.MSG_CN, B.REG_DT, B.INFO_ID, B.WRITER_ID, B.VIEW_CNT,D.USER_IMG, (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE INDEX(A UWFDTB0401_IX01) */ COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0401 E WHERE MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID) AS IMG_CNT, C.USER_SR_CODE FROM UWFDTB0501 A, UWFDTB0301 B, UWFDTB0201 C, UWFDTB0201 D WHERE A.TAG_NM LIKE :query ||'%' AND A.MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID AND B.USER_ID=C.USER_ID AND D.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN B.USER_ID=B.WRITER_ID OR B.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN B.USER_ID ELSE B.WRITER_ID END)
UNION ALL
SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) INDEX(A UWFDTB0301_IX01) USE_NL(B C) */ A.MSG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.MSG_CN, A.REG_DT, A.INFO_ID, A.WRITER_ID, A.VIEW_CNT, C.USER_IMG, (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE INDEX(A UWFDTB0401_IX01) */ COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0401 C WHERE MSG_ID=A.MSG_ID) AS IMG_CNT, B.USER_SR_CODE FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0201 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE A.USER_ID=:query AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND C.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN A.USER_ID=A.WRITER_ID OR A.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN A.USER_ID ELSE A.WRITER_ID END) ) R ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
INSERT INTO UWFDTB0101 VALUES(:mstUserId, :subUserId, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
SELECT MST_USER_ID, SUB_USER_ID, REG_DT FROM UWFDTB0101 WHERE MST_USER_ID=:mstUserId AND SUB_USER_ID=:subUserId
DELETE FROM UWFDTB0101 WHERE MST_USER_ID=:mstUserId AND SUB_USER_ID=:subUserId
INSERT INTO UWFDTB0401(IMG_ID, USER_ID, MSG_ID, IMG_NM, IMG_CN, IMG_URL, REG_DT) VALUES(:imgId, :userId, :msgId, :imgNm, :imgCn, :imgUrl, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
SELECT A.IMG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.MSG_ID, A.IMG_NM, A.IMG_CN, A.IMG_URL, SUBSTR(A.REG_DT,1,12) AS REG_DT FROM UWFDTB0401 A WHERE A.MSG_ID=:msgId

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) USE_NL(A B) */ A.USER_ID, A.MCNT, B.USER_NM, B.CN FROM (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE */ A.USER_ID, COUNT(*) MCNT FROM UWFDTB0201 A, UWFDTB0301 B WHERE A.USER_SR_CODE=:userSrCode AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND A.OPEN_YN='Y' GROUP BY A.USER_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID ORDER BY MCNT DESC

SELECT /*+ USE_NL(A B) */ A.USER_ID, A.SE_CODE, A.MCNT, B.USER_NM, B.CN FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.SE_CODE, COUNT(*) AS MCNT FROM (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE INDEX(A UWFDTB0201_IX01) */ USER_ID, '002' AS SE_CODE FROM UWFDTB0201 A WHERE A.USER_SR_CODE='002' AND A.OPEN_YN='Y' EXCEPT SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) INDEX(A UWFDTB0101_IX01) INDEX(B UWFDTB0201_PK) */ USER_ID, '002' AS SE_CODE FROM UWFDTB0101 A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.SUB_USER_ID=:userId AND A.MST_USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.USER_SR_CODE='002') A, UWFDTB0301 B WHERE A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID GROUP BY A.USER_ID, A.SE_CODE HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
UNION
SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) INDEX(A UWFDTB0101_IX01) INDEX(B UWFDTB0201_PK) */ B.USER_ID, '001' AS SE_CODE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0301 WHERE USER_ID=B.USER_ID) AS MCNT FROM UWFDTB0101 A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.SUB_USER_ID=:userId AND A.MST_USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.USER_SR_CODE='002') A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID ORDER BY SE_CODE, MCNT DESC

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) USE_NL(A B) */ A.USER_ID, A.MCNT, B.USER_NM, B.CN FROM (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE */ A.USER_ID, COUNT(*) MCNT FROM UWFDTB0201 A, UWFDTB0301 B WHERE A.USER_SR_CODE=:userSrCode AND A.USER_ID LIKE '%'||:queryMuseum ||'%' AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND A.OPEN_YN='Y' GROUP BY A.USER_ID ) A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID ORDER BY MCNT DESC

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0101_IX01) INDEX(B UWFDTB0301_IX01) INDEX(C UWFDTB0201_PK) INDEX(D UWFDTB0201_PK) USE_NL(C D) */ B.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||B.USER_ID || '['||B.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='001' AND B.USER_ID<>B.WRITER_ID THEN '@'||B.USER_ID || '['||B.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||B.USER_ID END AS USER_ID, B.REGN_INF_ID, B.MSG_CN, SUBSTR(B.REG_DT,1,12) AS REG_DT, B.INFO_ID, B.WRITER_ID, B.VIEW_CNT, D.USER_IMG, (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE INDEX(A UWFDTB0401_IX01) */ COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0401 A WHERE MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID) AS IMG_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0311 E WHERE E.MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID) AS RPL_CNT FROM UWFDTB0101 A, UWFDTB0301 B, UWFDTB0201 C, UWFDTB0201 D WHERE A.SUB_USER_ID=:userId AND A.MST_USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID=C.USER_ID AND D.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN B.USER_ID=B.WRITER_ID OR B.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN B.USER_ID ELSE B.WRITER_ID END) ORDER BY B.REG_DT DESC

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) USE_NL(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0301_IX03) INDEX(B UWFDTB0201_PK) INDEX(C UWFDTB0201_PK) */ A.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||A.USER_ID || '['||A.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE='001' AND A.USER_ID<>A.WRITER_ID THEN '@'||A.USER_ID || '['||A.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||A.USER_ID END AS USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.MSG_CN, SUBSTR(A.REG_DT,1,12) AS REG_DT, A.VIEW_CNT, A.INFO_ID, C.USER_IMG, A.WRITER_ID, (SELECT /*+ NO_MERGE INDEX(A UWFDTB0401_IX01) */ COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0401 D WHERE MSG_ID=A.MSG_ID) AS IMG_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UWFDTB0311 E WHERE E.MSG_ID=A.MSG_ID) AS RPL_CNT FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0201 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.WRITER_ID=:userId AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.OPEN_YN='Y' AND C.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN A.USER_ID=A.WRITER_ID OR A.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN A.USER_ID ELSE A.WRITER_ID END) ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC
UPDATE UWFDTB0301 SET VIEW_CNT = (SELECT CAST((CASE WHEN VIEW_CNT IS NULL THEN 0 END) AS integer) + 1 FROM UWFDTB0301 WHERE MSG_ID=:msgId) WHERE MSG_ID=:msgId

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) */ A.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE = '002' THEN 'ⓜ' || A.USER_ID || '[@'|| A.WRITER_ID || ']' ELSE '@' || A.USER_ID END AS USER_INFO, A.USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.MSG_CN, A.REG_DT, A.INFO_ID, A.WRITER_ID FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.MSG_ID=:msgId AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID
INSERT INTO UWFDTB0311(RPL_ID, MSG_ID, USER_ID, RPL_MSG_CN, REG_DT) VALUES('L'||LPAD(UWFDTB0311_SEQ_01.NEXTVAL,14,0), :msgId, :userId, :rplMsgCn, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
SELECT A.RPL_ID, A.MSG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.RPL_MSG_CN, A.REG_DT, B.USER_IMG FROM UWFDTB0311 A, UWFDTB0201 B WHERE A.MSG_ID=:msgId AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID

SELECT A.MSG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.WRITER_ID, A.VIEW_CNT, B.IMG_ID, B.IMG_URL, B.REG_DT, CASE WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||C.USER_ID||'[@'||A.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN A.USER_ID<>A.WRITER_ID AND C.USER_SR_CODE='001' THEN '@'||A.USER_ID||'[@'||A.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||A.WRITER_ID END AS USER_INFO FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0401 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE WRITER_ID=:userId AND A.MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID AND A.USER_ID=C.USER_ID ORDER BY IMG_ID DESC

SELECT A.MSG_ID, A.USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.WRITER_ID, A.VIEW_CNT, B.IMG_ID, B.IMG_URL, B.REG_DT, CASE WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||C.USER_ID||'[@'||A.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN A.USER_ID<>A.WRITER_ID AND C.USER_SR_CODE='001' THEN '@'||A.USER_ID||'[@'||A.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||A.WRITER_ID END AS USER_INFO FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0401 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE A.USER_ID=:userId AND A.MSG_ID=B.MSG_ID AND A.USER_ID=C.USER_ID ORDER BY IMG_ID DESC
